entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dns.lookup.duration` metric for failed lookups #92837
  • Minor deficiency in value type unboxing codegen #92836
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add option to specify JsonNamingPolicy for enum serialization on JsonSourceGenerationOptions #92828
    Future
  • [maccatalyst] LLVM AOT build failure on iOS.Simulator.Aot-LLVM.Test #92827
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Deserialize Json Member as IAsyncEnumerable #92823
    Future
  • The JIT uses an redundant rbp register #92818
    9.0.0
  • bad JIT code generation in foreach loop #92809
    8.0.0
  • Request to backport JsonDocument thread safety fix to System.Text.Json v7 (PR#76716) #92808
    7.0.x
  • [8.0] File used by another process in Wasm.Build.Tests.Blazor.SimpleRunTests.BlazorBuildAndRunForDifferentOutputPaths #92805
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] 'RanToCompletion' failure in System.Threading.RateLimiting.Test.ConcurrencyLimiterTests.DoesNotDeadlockCleaningUpCanceledRequestedLease_Post #92804

Closed

  • Double.IsNegative returns true for Double.NaN #92834
  • Ping is not off by default in SocketsHttpHandler #92840
  • The compiler does not check that keys returned by the key selector passed to OrderBy are comparable #92691
  • `url.scheme` tag is emitted as part of `http.client.request.duration` metric that does not match the OTel spec #92077
  • Document NativeAOT diagnostics for the .NET8 release #88905
    8.0.0
  • QuicListener always listens on "ANY" endpoint ignoring QuicListenerOptions.ListenEndPoint config #92812
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'gtOper < GT_COUNT' during 'VN-based dead store removal' #91839
    9.0.0
  • Unable to deserialize JSON depicting object having list of properly attributed polymorphic base type or interface #92811
  • When a package has native assets for multiple rids the host ignores assets for base rids #92706
  • JIT: Failed ccmp recognition #92699
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono] Only emit pshufb when ssse3 is enabled. #92842
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Preinitialize pop/switch/Type.IsValueType #92841
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove fgUpdateFlowGraph from optOptimizeFlow #92839
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Throw exception in TensorPrimitives for unsupported span overlaps #92838
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix JsonDocument thread safety. #92832
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix JsonDocument thread safety. #92831
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.x
  • [linux-bionic] Skip failing NTLM tests #92830
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Clean up the crossgen2_publish project and local/live packs references #92826
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove 'tracing' from Native AOT PR runs #92825
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • SPMI: Simplify and improve reporting of context information #92824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Call UpdateChangedFlowGraph after ifConversion #92821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix deadlock in EventPipeEventDispatcher #92806
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Apply sequence equality comparison to the final Regex incremental value. #92835
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Remove `CompilationProvider` dependency from the source generator. #92833
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.ConvertToSingle #92779
    area-System.Numerics
  • [tests][iOS] Fix iOS.Device.Aot.Test artifacts path #92783
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios
  • Always emit jump from hot finally block to cold target #92797
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add stress mode for arm/arm64 function fragment splitting #92802
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Common.Tests.GetPrettyName_CannotRead_ReturnsNull test for root user #92695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Use a different crossgen2 when running crossgen2 during our build than the crossgen2 that we are shipping #92677
    area-Infrastructure
  • Allow `key#value` for superpmi JIT option specification #92803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move variable scope tracking code #92800
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Optimize SequenceEqual to use ccmp on ARM64 #92810
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable TensorPrimitives to perform in-place operations #92820
    area-System.Numerics
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.ConvertToHalf #92715
    area-System.Numerics
  • Implement StoreVector64x2 and StoreVector128x2 for Arm64 #92109
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Do not nop-out SSA definitions in block morphing #92786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Cleanup unused runtime functions #91681
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Supress policheck warning in blazor-sample #92711
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Make effect handling in lowering less conservative #92710
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Correctly set sendTrustList flag when saving credentials to cache #92731
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Update `ryujit-overview.md` #92789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Update Ubuntu 16.04 amd64 queues to 22.04 #92794
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Update Ubuntu 16.04 amd64 queues to 22.04 #92796
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Bring back CopyOutputSymbolsToPublishDirectory #92369
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • JIT: fix self-conflicting HFA arg prolog handling for arm64 #92355
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use specific version of v8 for tests #91633
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Define `getWasmIndirectFunctionTable` before initializing the #92683
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/8.0] [wasm] Endian fix for Webcil #92495
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Reorder indirs on arm64 to make them amenable to ldp optimization #92768
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow multiple post-build steps and allow templated pre and post-build steps #92375
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Move GetMethodTable and IsReference to JIT #88860
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Include info about system call errors in some exceptions from operating on named mutexes #92603
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Fix #91958: use `mach_timebase_info` to determine process time coefficient on macOS #92185
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Fix Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add plain Vector128 support to IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher #92680
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Disable MetricsSupport feature by default #92696
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0] Manually update release/8.0 arcade to latest #92778
    Servicing-approved, blocking-release, area-codeflow
  • WIP: [ios][tests] Trim on helix for libraries and functional tests on CI #92719
    needs-area-label
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Remove dependencies on non-live illink #91468
    needs-area-label
  • Update targetingpacks.targets #88991
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][infra] Use llvm toolchain instead of binutils on linux #92057
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Fuse SIMD extract and insert on arm64 #92714
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Use UnsafeAccessor in JSHostImplementation instead of reflection #92755
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Apple mobile template allows passing process arguments to the runtime #92772
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing of valuetype scheme #92637
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/8.0][wasm][debugger] Support multidimensional indexing of object scheme #92753
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Make `TypeDescriptor` thread safe with custom providers by enlarging `lock` region #92521
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Question: Does dotnet/runtimelab want to host WIT code gen issues #2409

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test projects do not automatically select a RuntimeIdentifier, breaking use of native libraries #35792

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable IDE0200 "Lambda expression can be removed" warning #35797
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't add implicit package references when downloads have been disabled. #35796
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • allow non-web projects to invoke Publish Profile-derived targets #35794
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Avoid running new APIs under older TFMs #35765
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Parse -d command differently based on position #35492
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Add dotnet package search command #35742
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2280140 #35586
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Detect correctly multitargeted apps for trim/AOT/single-file warnings #35767
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Meaningful error on runtime identifier mismatch in project.assets.json #35491
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Handle diagnostics from HostDiagnosticUpdateSource in LSP pull diagnostics mode #70188
  • Code Cleanup too aggressive with formatting of dotnet_diagnostic.CS0219 #70187

Closed

  • C# dynamic parameter influences handling methods return #70163
  • CS8509 (Switch is not exhaustive): Make it smarter. #70164
  • NRE in CSharpUseCollectionExpressionForFluentDiagnosticAnalyzer #70178

PullRequests

Created

  • Add ReferenceOutputAssembly="false" to language server dlls we don't ship #70195
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Add a struct enumerator for NodeStateTable<T>" #70194
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update 'use collection expression' analyzer/fixer to support conversion when a capacity argument is passed. #70193
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: analyze nullability of element assignments #70192
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Fix VB features impacted by IOperation change #70191
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add Global prefix to VBCSCompiler mutex to make it visible on nix systems #70189
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Enable LSP pull diagnostics from Run Code Analysis command #70186
    Area-IDE, Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Synthesized members #70184
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Small bits of cleanup in code actions #70190
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Set rollForward again #70180
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Re-enable static graph evaluation #70149
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Check for particular collection expr attribute by name, as it can be provided internally in packages #70179
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Properly parse members in type declarations missing an identifier #69798
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Improve generic type argument list error recovery #69734
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: avoid intermediate List<T> if spread elements have known length #69875
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Collection expressions: update better conversion from expression rule #70158
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Avoid cycle caused by calculation of ObsoleteState/ExperimentalState. #70171
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Send batch events for DiagnosticsUpdatedArgs #70039
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Public API for roslyn features (like CodeActions) to expose the ability to report progress as they run. #50211
    Area-IDE
  • Bump MSBuild.StructuredLogger package version #70157
    Area-Infrastructure
  • WIP: Testing insertion cost. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Check constructor for conversion to IEnumerable collection #69956
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Collection expressions: use applicable EnsureCapacity() when length is known #70181
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow WebApplication.CreateEmptyBuilder to have host configuration provided using ConfigurationManager #51033
  • Error.razor should always be a static server rendered page #51031
  • HTTP OTEL metrics: use `error.type` instead of `exception.type` attribute #51029
  • .NET 8 RC1 Blazor Web App Deployed to IIS Can't Find Resources #51027
  • Lowest common denominator between IQueryCollection and IHeaderDictionary is too low. Why not inherit IReadOnlyDictionary? #51024
  • Installing just ASP.Net Core Runtime Windows Hosting Bundle has different behavior than Dotnet SDK #51023
  • System.TypeLoadException utilizing latest Blazor Web App Authentication build failure. #51022
  • data-permanent doesn't apply to the element with that attribute #51021
  • Add glb file extension to known content types #51017
  • [FromBody]-Attribute not working for SignalR #51014
  • Unclear error when incompatible JavaScript included on page (but works in SSR) #51010
  • Content-Length mismatch randomly on high troughput when using StackExchange Redis Output Caching #51009
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #51007
  • Missing documentation for `StaticWebAssetProjectMode` attribute in ` *.Client.csproj` file #51006
  • IDX40001: Issuer: 'https://tenantname.b2clogin.com/tenantId/v2.0/', does not match any of the valid issuers provided for this application. #51005

Closed

  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Server package update to 7.0.11 breaks Blazor Debugging (Breakpoints are not reached) #51011
  • Perf improvement: json #50901
  • Unable to use Static file authorization and Razor Pages & Blazor at the same time #50975

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix failing Kestrel test due to Pings #51034
    area-networking
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix Blazor WebAssembly PWA empty template #51032
    area-blazor
  • Blazor web csharp template #51030
    area-mvc, area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add SERVER_NAME variable to IISUrlRewrite #51020
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [Form data mapping] Support for mapping URIs from form data #51019
    area-blazor
  • Add file extension #51018
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Push history entry after enhanced submit with method=get #51013
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0

Merged

  • Fix Http/3 tests #50852
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `80306a7` to `e47544a` #51016
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Update _Imports.razor to include sections namespace #49166
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Delete eng/BeforeTargetFrameworkInference.targets #50928
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Improvements to SSR component activation #50848
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor
  • Add SetBrowserRequestStreamingEnabled extension method #50481
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2280008 #50997
    area-mvc
  • Use generated PInvokes and exchange types #50685
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Disambiguate type names by containing assembly in WellKnownTypes #50969
    area-mvc, analyzer, area-minimal

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-29

Issues

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Line height does not work as expected #17741
  • No way to set Splash Screen fullscreen/immersive in Android? #17737
  • Windows app only shows first item in the CollectionView #17736
  • Android App crashes if CollectionView have more than one item #17735

Closed

  • Blazor MAUI JS Isolation Not Working #17748
  • DeviceInfo.Current.VersionString crash android apk #17253
  • Webview on Android devices don't send __RequestVerificationToken to MVC endpoint with [ValidateAntiForgeryToken] annotation #17269
  • Maui iOS - Search bar won't focus after clearing #17280
  • MAUI Autogenerate icons for Mac Catalyst & iOS #17279
    Backlog
  • Error compiling after installing the OneSignalSDK.DotNet component in Visual Studio on the MAC #17742
  • "Scrollable Editor" is needed - ie. Editor natively prebuilt inside scroll window like any standard texting or typing box (eg. Whatsapp, SMS, forum posting) #17740
  • Unable to archive app if it references a .NET Standard 2.0 class library #11906
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Grid with BoxView inside calculates incorrect width when ColumnsSpacing is non zero. #15328
  • Label's text property affects the scrolling performance on mac #17739
  • VS Code Mac, Output HE0031: Failed to mount developer tools on iPhone #17718

PullRequests

Created

  • Make sure to account for a null AppWindow #17746
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2] Fix running tests #17743
  • [X] revert #5611 #17733
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 GA
  • API Doc improvements to fix online browser warnings #17732
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Implement gestures on Spans #17731
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-label

Merged

  • Add other controls to the UI tests #17728
    area/testing

Updated

  • Remove Debug and Release Entitlements plists and Replace with Custom Entitlements #16355
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, do-not-merge, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA
  • Run template tests run in parallel to save 15min of run time #17672
    do-not-merge, area/templates 📄
  • Make ALL template warnings show up as test errors (not just C# warnings), and produce more diagnostic artifacts #17637
    area/templates 📄
  • Fixes BindableLayout BindingContext inheritance #17290
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Windows] Fix margin on title bar #17729
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Windows] Fix wrong Layout from hidden CollectionView #17659
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Fix RefreshView loading indicator position #17647
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview, .NET 8 SR1
  • Add border visual tests #17633
  • Avoid NRE if no shell items are visible #16946
    area/shell 🐢, stale, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Fix wrong gray color using transparent in iOS gradients #17696
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix legacy logical children to correctly add/remove #17410
    t/bug, control-swipeview, .NET 9 Planning
  • Reinstate animated GIF on iOS & macOS #17207
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling Improvements and UITests (not from fork) #17670
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, area/keyboard, Under Consideration
  • Fix TabbedPage title displaying incorrectly #17039
    community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fix text toolbar item icon not removed when navigating on Android #16796
    community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Bump the androidx group with 14 updates #17401
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 SR1
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 2 updates #17693
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix: Binding doesn't respect special IValueConverter return values #12060
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Windows] Show the Raw HTML for Html Label in case of error #17470
    area/controls 🎮, Under Consideration
  • Wrap Image with a container on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #17665
    area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Draw Line using BackgroundColor #17376
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, .NET 8 SR1
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, s/pr-needs-author-input, area/gestures, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SQLite affinity fallback is wrong: fallback to blob instead of numeric #31915
  • Is it possible to define relationships that could reference one of multiple tables without foreign keys? #31913
  • Hierarchyid in a parameter collection does not work in 8.0-rc1 with MSSQL #31912
  • Convert.ToString(SomeProp, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) throws when used in a Union #31910
  • Upgrade 7.0.10 -> 7.0.11 #31906
  • Is there a way to alter the DbContext configuration after AddDbContext has been called? #31905
  • EF Core for Cosmos is setting an Owned Entity Property with the same value as the Key #31903

Closed

  • SqliteException: SQLite Error 19: 'NOT NULL constraint failed' when value is generated on add or update. #31730
  • json column stored foreign key for table #31886
  • SQLite EF Core crashed on AOT #31870

PullRequests

Updated

  • Fix lock loosing in concurrency detector for multiple contexts on one thread #31891

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-29
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unused artifacts blobs directory #17447

Merged

  • Include full path in poison report #17438
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Update sdk diff exclusions #17444
  • Move SourceBuild property to a non stable package #17396

Updated

  • Merge net9 runtime and known framework references into main #17433
  • License scanning for VMR #17442
    Area-SourceBuild
